remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托与下列附加事件一起使用：This delegate is used with the following attached events: - - 此委托也用于基元素上的以下路由事件。This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements. 这些路由的事件转发之前列出的附加的事件，以使它们更容易访问中的常规元素模型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - 附加的事件和基元素路由事件共享其事件数据，和的冒泡和隧道的路由事件的版本也共享事件数据。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 路由事件过程，这可能会影响该事件的处理的特征。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 附加的事件在拖放操作期间发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。The attached event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
